summary: A young woman has two distinct personalities, one of whom is evil and constantly gets her in trouble.
cast: Phyllis Thaxter|Edmund Gwenn|Henry H. Daniels Jr.|Addison Richards|Kathleen Lockhart|Francis Pierlot|Sharon McManus|Gladys Blake|Will Wright|Stephen McNally|Oscar O'Shea|Minor Watson|Virginia Brissac|Tom Coleman|Clancy Cooper|Eddie Dunn|George Meader|Howard M. Mitchell|Forbes Murray|Harry Seymour|Harry Strang|Forrest Taylor|Audrey Totter|Anthony Warde|Paul Weigel|Crane Whitley
title: Bewitched
